content.raw: For future circuits, would a submission process that allowed for multiple submissions for the final circuit solution be something that would ease tensions around the deadline?  That would allow for a competitor to submit intermediate solutions before submitting their final solution.  In this case, if something drastic did happen, your submission would fall back on your intermediate solution.
content.html: For future circuits, would a submission process that allowed for multiple submissions for the final circuit solution be something that would ease tensions around the deadline? That would allow for a competitor to submit intermediate solutions before submitting their final solution. In this case, if something drastic did happen, your submission would fall back on your intermediate solution.
